Suibin Hong
Computer Science Undergraduate in Sheffield, UK

About Me

I begun my journey with programming right about two years ago when I first entered university. While I've learnt a lot in my journey, I am always looking to expand my horizon. With my lately new found passion on the technology of blockchain , I plan to learn solidity over the summer. At the same time, I'd like to increase my proficiency on React along with Node.js.

I love building things. While hard engineering problems are often intrinsically fun to tackle, I'm most attracted to solving real customer problems with a business justification. I'm looking for an role where I could take on collaborative team leadership responsibilites, and gain experience with the industry and project management.

Highlights

  • Participation in agile development with real client over the course of 4 months. Created a web app for the faculties at the unviersity, granted with great client satisfaction
  • Created an eBay transaction handler and a product dispatcher in Node.JS and MongoDB
  • Shopify web design in Liquid for an online business in Italy
  • Dental appointment management system coded in Java and mySQL for database under agile development

Interests

My personal interests include:

  • Deep learning. It's an exciting time for machine learning. I'm working through several online classes, and intend to carry out sentiment analysis with the assist of machine learning in the upcoming year.
  • Blockchain. I've been an enthusiastic hobbiest since the start of this year - but only as I learning about smart contract was I able to foresee the potential of the technology. I'd like to make my own smart contract on the ethereum blockchain in the summer.
  • Cycling. I live in the north of England during my term time at university, home of some of the greatest mountains and trails in the country. I enjoy spending weekends crusing down trails and test my physical limits.

Recent Projects

  • Data Analytic on the influence of Blockchain experts on Cryptocurrency price.
  • Study on SEO, Facebook ad and Google ad for boosting sales of online businesses
  • Maintenance and monthly revamp for an online fashion business
  • My Medium blog covers my insight into the whitepaper of Cryptocurrency.

Other Things

  • Member of American Football club at the University of Sheffield(2017)
